n=int(input())
for _ in range(n):
 x,y,k=list(map(int,input().split()))
 sumxy=x+y
 div=sumxy//k
 rem=sumxy%k
 #print("x,y,k,sumxy,div,rem",x,y,k,sumxy,div,rem)
 if (div%2==0):
  print("Chef")
 else:
  print("Paja")

for _ in range(int(input())):
 X, Y, K = map(int, input().split())
 turn = (X+Y) // K
 print('Paja' if turn%2 else 'Chef')
